spacesuit,2,Oracle said: What is your first question?	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a spacesuit.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have moving parts?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of require electricity to operate?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have buttons or controls that can be pressed?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of make noise?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in most households?

 Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a hinge.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have buttons or controls that can be pressed?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of make noise?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in most households?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on your answers I am going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a clock. Is that correct?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a fixed location or is it something that can be moved?

Oracle said: It can be moved.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of require electricity to function?

Oracle said: No.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a barbell.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a fixed location or is it something that can be moved?

Oracle said: It can be moved.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of require electricity to function?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of require electricity to function?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for cooking or food preparation?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a typical household?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be sat on?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a kitchen?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for personal grooming?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a bathroom?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a bedroom?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a living room?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object can be held in your hand, can be moved, is man-made, serves a functional purpose, does not require electricity, is found indoors, is found in a typical household, and is not used for cooking, food preparation, personal grooming, or sitting, I'm going to take a guess that the object is a book. Is that correct?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to organize things?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a fixed location or is it something that can be moved?

Oracle said: It can be moved.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of require electricity to function?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for cooking or food preparation?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a typical household?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be sat on?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a kitchen?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for personal grooming?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a bathroom?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a bedroom?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a living room?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object can be held in your hand, can be moved, is man-made, serves a functional purpose, does not require electricity, is found indoors, is found in a typical household, and is not used for cooking, food preparation, personal grooming, or sitting, I'm going to take a guess that the object is a book. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a garage or a storage area?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object can be held in your hand, can be moved, is man-made, serves a functional purpose, does not require electricity, is found indoors, is found in a typical household, is found in a garage or storage area, and is not used for cooking, food preparation, personal grooming, or sitting, I'm going to take a guess that the object is a tool. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used to clean something?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to store things?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to organize things?

Oracle said: No.

You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: .  Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Oracle said: No.

Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: No.

Oracle said: No.

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a bathroom?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a bedroom?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a living room?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . 	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you're thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you're thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . 	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you're thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you're thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you're thinking of have buttons or controls of some kind?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you're thinking of used for eating or drinking?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you're thinking of made of plastic?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you're thinking of have a screen of some kind?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you're thinking of commonly found in a kitchen?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you're thinking of have a distinct or unusual smell?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you're thinking of used for personal grooming or hygiene?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be held in my hand, is made of plastic, and doesn't have buttons or controls, I'm going to guess that the object you're thinking of is a plastic water bottle. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be held in my hand, is made of plastic, and doesn't have buttons or controls, I'm going to guess that the object you're thinking of is a plastic cup. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be held in my hand, is made of plastic, and doesn't have buttons or controls, I'm going to guess that the object you're thinking of is a plastic container. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be held in my hand, is made of plastic, and doesn't have buttons or controls, I'm going to guess that the object you're thinking of is a plastic container for storing small items. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . dishtowel,50,Oracle said: What is your first question?	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a dishtowel.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you're thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

 Guesser said: Is the object you're thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: NoGuesser said: Is the object you're thinking of something that can be used for cleaning?Oracle said: YesGuesser said: Is the object you're thinking of something that is typically used in a kitchen?Oracle said: YesGuesser said: Is the object you're thinking of a type of cloth?Oracle said: YesGuesser said: Is the object you're thinking of something that is commonly used to dry dishes?Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you're thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: NoGuesser said: Is the object you're thinking of something that can be used for cleaning?Oracle said: YesGuesser said: Is the object you're thinking of something that is typically used in a kitchen?Oracle said: YesGuesser said: Is the object you're thinking of a type of cloth?Oracle said: YesGuesser said: Is the object you're thinking of something that is commonly used to dry dishes?Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the fact that it's a cloth used for drying dishes, I'm going to guess that the object you're thinking of is a dish towel.Oracle said: Yes, that's correct! Congratulations! You guessed it in just 6 questions! Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: YesGuesser said: Is the object you're thinking of a type of container?Oracle said: YesGuesser said: Is the object you're thinking of something that is used to store clothing?Oracle said: Yes.

When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a dishtowel.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?

	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

Guesser said: Is the object commonly found in most households?

 Oracle said: No.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a gargoyle.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object commonly found in most households?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object have moving parts?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object require electricity to function?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object related to a sport or physical activity?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object used primarily indoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is man-made, commonly found in most households, and used primarily indoors, I'm going to guess that the object is a light bulb.Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object something that can be sat or stood on?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is man-made, used primarily indoors, and is used for a specific purpose, I'm going to guess that the object is a bookshelf.Is that correct?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object commonly found in most households?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object have moving parts?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object have a distinct or unusual smell?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object made primarily of plastic?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object made primarily of wood?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object used for a specific purpose or function?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object used for a purpose that is related to food or drink?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object require electricity to function?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object related to a sport or physical activity?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object used primarily indoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is man-made, commonly found in most households, and used primarily indoors, I'm going to guess that the object is a light bulb.Is that correct?

 Guesser said: Is the object something that can be sat or stood on?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is man-made, used primarily indoors, and is used for a specific purpose, I'm going to guess that the object is a bookshelf.Is that correct?

When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a kitchen?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a bedroom?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used for personal hygiene?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found on a dresser?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to guess that the object is a mirror. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a closet?

 Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a textbook.

You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a textbook.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a kitchen?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a bedroom?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used for personal hygiene?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found on a dresser?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to guess that the object is a mirror. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a closet?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a coat or jacket?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be hung on a hook?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: I'm going to guess that the object is a belt. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found on the back of a door?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to guess that the object is a hook. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a picture or a photo?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a bathroom?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: I'm going to guess that the object is a hanger. Is that correct?

You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for recreation or entertainment?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of require electricity to function?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of involve water?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of involve fire?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used by only one person at a time?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used outdoors in a variety of weather conditions?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for a sport or game?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on all the information you've given me, I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a basketball. Is that correct?

Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of exist in the natural world?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a living thing?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a rock or mineral of some sort?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct shape or form?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow in the ground?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow on a plant or tree?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a man-made object, but made from a natural material?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, and has a distinct shape or form, I'm going to guess that the object is a piece of driftwood. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of commonly used for a specific purpose, such as a tool or a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a hole or a cavity in it?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of exist in the natural world?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a living thing?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a rock or mineral of some sort?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct shape or form?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow in the ground?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow on a plant or tree?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a man-made object, but made from a natural material?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, and has a distinct shape or form, I'm going to guess that the object is a piece of driftwood. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of commonly used for a specific purpose, such as a tool or a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a hole or a cavity in it?

 Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a harpoon.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of exist in the natural world?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a living thing?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a rock or mineral of some sort?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct shape or form?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow in the ground?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow on a plant or tree?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a man-made object, but made from a natural material?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, and has a distinct shape or form, I'm going to guess that the object is a piece of driftwood. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of commonly used for a specific purpose, such as a tool or a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a hole or a cavity in it?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, has a distinct shape or form, is commonly used for a specific purpose, and has a hole or a cavity in it, I'm going to guess that the object is a wooden bowl. Is that correct?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of exist in the natural world?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a living thing?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a rock or mineral of some sort?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct shape or form?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow in the ground?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow on a plant or tree?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a man-made object, but made from a natural material?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, and has a distinct shape or form, I'm going to guess that the object is a piece of driftwood. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of commonly used for a specific purpose, such as a tool or a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a hole or a cavity in it?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, has a distinct shape or form, is commonly used for a specific purpose, and has a hole or a cavity in it, I'm going to guess that the object is a wooden bowl. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow in the ground?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow on a plant or tree?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a man-made object, but made from a natural material?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, and has a distinct shape or form, I'm going to guess that the object is a piece of driftwood. Is that correct?

Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a tool used for a specific task, such as cutting or digging?

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct shape or form?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow in the ground?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow on a plant or tree?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a man-made object, but made from a natural material?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, and has a distinct shape or form, I'm going to guess that the object is a piece of driftwood. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of commonly used for a specific purpose, such as a tool or a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a hole or a cavity in it?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, has a distinct shape or form, is commonly used for a specific purpose, and has a hole or a cavity in it, I'm going to guess that the object is a wooden bowl. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a handle or a grip of some sort?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, has a distinct shape or form, is commonly used for a specific purpose, has a hole or a cavity in it, and has a handle or a grip of some sort, I'm going to guess that the object is a wooden spoon.  Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of exist in the natural world?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a living thing?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a rock or mineral of some sort?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct shape or form?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow in the ground?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of grow on a plant or tree?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a man-made object, but made from a natural material?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, and has a distinct shape or form, I'm going to guess that the object is a piece of driftwood. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of commonly used for a specific purpose, such as a tool or a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a hole or a cavity in it?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, has a distinct shape or form, is commonly used for a specific purpose, and has a hole or a cavity in it, I'm going to guess that the object is a wooden bowl. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a handle or a grip of some sort?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, has a distinct shape or form, is commonly used for a specific purpose, has a hole or a cavity in it, and has a handle or a grip of some sort, I'm going to guess that the object is a wooden spoon. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a tool used for a specific task, such as cutting or digging?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, but made from a natural material, has a distinct shape or form, is commonly used for a specific purpose, has a hole or a cavity in it, has a handle or a grip of some sort, and is used for a specific task, I'm going to guess that the object is an axe. Is that correct?

You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a sweater.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have moving parts?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. The object you are thinking of is a sweater.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have moving parts?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of serve a functional purpose?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of related to food or drink?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a typical household?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be found in a typical household, serves a functional purpose, and is not related to food or drink, I'm going to take a guess that the object you are thinking of is a chair. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a kitchen?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a bathroom?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be found in a typical household, serves a functional purpose, is not related to food or drink, and is not found in a kitchen or bathroom, my next guess is that the object you are thinking of is a lamp. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used to write or draw with?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a bedroom?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be found in a typical household, serves a functional purpose, is not related to food or drink, is not found in a kitchen or bathroom, and is found in a bedroom, my next guess is that the object you are thinking of is a bed. Am I correct?

 Guesser said: What category or general type of object are you thinking of?

Oracle said: Jewelry.

Guesser said: Is the jewelry something that is typically worn on the hand or wrist?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the jewelry something that is worn on the body but not typically visible when it's not in use?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the jewelry something that is worn on the torso?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the jewelry serve a functional purpose in addition to being decorative?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does the jewelry have a clasp or fastener that needs to be closed to keep it in place?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the jewelry have a chain that it hangs from?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the jewelry have a pendant or other decorative element that hangs from it?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that it's a piece of jewelry that is worn on the torso, has a clasp or fastener, and has a pendant or other decorative element, I'm going to guess that it's a necklace. Is that correct?

You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a mirror.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a kitchen?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have buttons or controls that you can press?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have moving parts?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual shape?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found on a table or countertop?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on your answers, I am going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a plate.Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to prepare food?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to store food?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to consume food or drink?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: Yes.

 Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of exist in nature, or is it man-made?

 Oracle said: Man-made.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

 Oracle said: Yes.

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that is man-made, something created by humans?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have moving parts?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that is commonly found in most households?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a specific purpose or function?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that can be found outdoors?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual shape?

Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a incubator.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that you can physically hold in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that is man-made, something created by humans?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have moving parts?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that is commonly found in most households?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a specific purpose or function?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that can be found outdoors?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual shape?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on what you have told me, I'm going to guess that what you are thinking of is a rock.Am I correct?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a incubator.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that you can physically hold in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that is man-made, something created by humans?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have moving parts?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that is commonly found in most households?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a specific purpose or function?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that can be found outdoors?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual shape?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on what you have told me, I'm going to guess that what you are thinking of is a rock.Am I correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual texture?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on what you have told me, I'm going to guess that what you are thinking of is a piece of driftwood. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that can be used for decoration?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on what you have told me, I'm going to guess that what you are thinking of is a vase. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual smell?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on what you have told me, I'm going to guess that what you are thinking of is a scented candle. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that is typically found in a garden or a yard?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on what you have told me, I'm going to guess that what you are thinking of is a piece of coral. Is that correct?

When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that you can physically hold in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that is man-made, something created by humans?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have moving parts?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that is commonly found in most households?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a specific purpose or function?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that can be found outdoors?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual shape?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on what you have told me, I'm going to guess that what you are thinking of is a rock.Am I correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual texture?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on what you have told me, I'm going to guess that what you are thinking of is a piece of driftwood. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that can be used for decoration?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on what you have told me, I'm going to guess that what you are thinking of is a vase. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual smell?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on what you have told me, I'm going to guess that what you are thinking of is a scented candle. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is what you are thinking of something that is typically found in a garden or a yard?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on what you have told me, I'm going to guess that what you are thinking of is a piece of coral. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual color?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: No.

 Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does what you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual taste?

Oracle said: Yes.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of require electricity to function?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of require fuel to function?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of run on gasoline?

 Oracle said: No.

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a typical household?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used primarily outdoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a tool of some kind?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: That helps. Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for a specific task, like pruning or digging?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of used primarily with the hands?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is commonly used for gardening?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: With all of that information, I'm going to take a guess. I think the object you are thinking of is a trowel. Is that correct?

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object something that serves a functional purpose?

Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . Guesser said: Is the object commonly used for communication?

 Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a plane.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does the object have a fixed location or is it portable?

Oracle said: It is portable.

Guesser said: Is the object man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object made of a material that is commonly found in nature, but is often processed or refined before being used in the object?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object have moving parts?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object powered by electricity?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object require a battery to operate?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object commonly used for entertainment?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object commonly used for communication?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to take a guess that the object is a cell phone. Am I correct?

When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: What is the object you are thinking of, a living thing, a non-living thing, or something that is neither?

Oracle said: It is a non-living thing.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in most households?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said:Based on the information that the object is non-living, man-made, serves a functional purpose, and is commonly found in most households, I am going to guess that the object is a refrigerator. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in the kitchen?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Since the object is commonly found in most households, serves a functional purpose, is man-made, and is located in the kitchen, I am going to guess that the object is a toaster. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for food preparation?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for cleaning up after food preparation?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to store food or drinks?

 Oracle said: No.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a thermostat.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: What is the object you are thinking of, a living thing, a non-living thing, or something that is neither?

Oracle said: It is a non-living thing.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in most households?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said:Based on the information that the object is non-living, man-made, serves a functional purpose, and is commonly found in most households, I am going to guess that the object is a refrigerator. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in the kitchen?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Since the object is commonly found in most households, serves a functional purpose, is man-made, and is located in the kitchen, I am going to guess that the object is a toaster. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for food preparation?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for cleaning up after food preparation?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to store food or drinks?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to prepare or serve food or drinks, but is not used for food preparation itself?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to cook food?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object.
