Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: What is the object you are thinking of, a living thing, a non-living thing, or something that is neither?

Oracle said: It is a non-living thing.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in most households?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said:Based on the information that the object is non-living, man-made, serves a functional purpose, and is commonly found in most households, I am going to guess that the object is a refrigerator. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in the kitchen?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Since the object is commonly found in most households, serves a functional purpose, is man-made, and is located in the kitchen, I am going to guess that the object is a toaster. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for food preparation?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for cleaning up after food preparation?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to store food or drinks?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to prepare or serve food or drinks, but is not used for food preparation itself?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for serving food or drinks?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Since the object is commonly found in most households, serves a functional purpose, is man-made, and is located in the kitchen, I am going to guess that the object is a plate. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to clean up after a meal?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to hold or carry food or drinks?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to cook food?

Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a thermostat.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: What is the object you are thinking of, a living thing, a non-living thing, or something that is neither?

Oracle said: It is a non-living thing.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: Yes.

You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that you can hold in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a typical household?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found outdoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of serve a purpose related to recreation or sports?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a ball?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for a team sport?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for a water sport?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a surfboard?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a paddle?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: I think the object you are thinking of is a kayak paddle. Am I correct?

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is electronic?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used for entertainment?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on your answers I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a video game console. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in one's hand?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is electronic, serves a functional purpose, has moving parts, and is used for entertainment, I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a projector. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of require electricity to operate?

 Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . 	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in one's hand?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of require electricity to function?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have buttons or controls that one can press?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: With the object requiring electricity and having buttons or controls, I'm going to take a guess that the object you are thinking of is a computer. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Oracle said: No.

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object requires electricity, has buttons or controls, and is something that serves a functional purpose, my next guess is that the object you are thinking of is a toaster. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object requires electricity, has buttons or controls, and is something that serves a functional purpose, my next guess is that the object you are thinking of is a toaster. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Since the object requires electricity, has buttons or controls, and is something that serves a functional purpose, my next guess is that the object you are thinking of is a blender. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in one's hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that serves a functional purpose?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of require electricity to function?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have buttons or controls that one can press?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: With the object requiring electricity and having buttons or controls, I'm going to take a guess that the object you are thinking of is a computer. Is that correct?

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have buttons or controls that one can press?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: With the object requiring electricity and having buttons or controls, I'm going to take a guess that the object you are thinking of is a computer. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object requires electricity and has buttons or controls, I'm going to take a guess that the object you are thinking of is a television. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Since the object requires electricity and has buttons or controls, I'm going to take a guess that the object you are thinking of is a stereo or a sound system. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Since the object requires electricity and has buttons or controls, I'm going to take a guess that the object you are thinking of is a microwave oven. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object requires electricity, has buttons or controls, and is something that serves a functional purpose, my next guess is that the object you are thinking of is a toaster. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Since the object requires electricity, has buttons or controls, and is something that serves a functional purpose, my next guess is that the object you are thinking of is a blender. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Since the object requires electricity, has buttons or controls, and is something that serves a functional purpose, my next guess is that the object you are thinking of is a coffee maker. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Since the object requires electricity, has buttons or controls, and is something that serves a functional purpose, my next guess is that the object you are thinking of is a dishwasher. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Since the object requires electricity, has buttons or controls, and is something that serves a functional purpose, my next guess is that the object you are thinking of is a refrigerator. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Since the object requires electricity, has buttons or controls, and is something that serves a functional purpose, my next guess is that the object you are thinking of is a washing machine. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Since the object requires electricity, has buttons or controls, and is something that serves a functional purpose, my next guess is that the object you are thinking of is a vacuum cleaner. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Since the object requires electricity, has buttons or controls, and is something that serves a functional purpose, my next guess is that the object you are thinking of is a air conditioner. Is that correct?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again.
